I am looking for someone to take over my lease. It's a three-bedroom, two-and-a-half-bath townhouse. Washer and dryer hook-ups (electric). The stove is gas. The townhouse has a covered patio area and plenty of storage space. The rooms are show contactspacious and all have ceiling fans. Utilities are separate, power is through Marietta Power and Gas is through Gas South. B lease as a tenant and then have you take me off of the lease and have yourself as the sole leaseholder. 

The property has a big room , an outside grilling area, a playground, and a pool. 

Parking is super convenient, it's right in front of the townhouse, and you will never have any issues with guest parking either.

Interest rates got you down? Try a lease with the option to buy your new home at a later time. This adorable 3 Bed 2 bath Scottdale home is available for a lease with an option to buy.

Send screenshot of the house you’re applying for

IT IS A SELF TOUR 

$900 Rent/Lease with a Right to Purchase

My name is ben , and I am a REALTOR with Fathom Realty GA, Inc. I work with an
amazing Lease with a Right to Purchase program. If you qualify for the program, you get to pick a house that is
FOR SALE based on your approved rent, in a community where they purchase and you can to rent that
house. The investment firm purchases the home, and you are only obligated to a 1 YEAR LEASE term at a time,
with a right to renew your lease for up to 5 years*. You can purchase the home at any time for a pre-agreed
upon price. I would love to tell you more. If you have a few minutes to reach out today, I can give you more
info. I hope we can connect, and your housing search goes smoothly. I look forward to hearing from you!
Frank

Text2: Mere Minutes to Butler! 1-BR with Porch, Fenced Yard, Washer-Dryer
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Left side of a side-by-side duplex located in the Crown Hill/Butler-Tarkington Neighborhood, 1 mile south of Butler University.

1 Bedroom 1 Bathrooms ; 800 sq ft ; Cats and Dogs OK

Address: 3715 Boulevard Place, Indianapolis, IN 46208

Restaurants Nearby: Napolese Pizzeria, Root and Bone, Aristocrat Pub

This unit features:

* New central air conditioning
* New gas furnace
* New roof
* New attic insulation
* New whole-house air purifier
* Kitchen with gas range and refrigerator
* Bathroom with tub/shower combo and new vanity
* Washer and Dryer in unit for your convenience
* Painted hardwood floors (no carpet!)
* Back door leads into fully fenced, private backyard
* Off-street parking behind backyard (enter via the alley)
* Covered front porch with peaceful view
* Spacious, waterproofed basement for storage or creative space

Great location! Minutes to Downtown Indy, Meridian Kessler and Broad Ripple. Easy access to IndyGo and Red Line Bus Routes: walk 2 blocks to catch the 18, 28 or 38 bus. Bicycle to Butler University, Ivy Tech or IUPUI. Close to the Children's Museum and the Indianapolis Museum of Art.

No Smoking on the premises.
Utilities: Tenant responsibility. Tenants to place all utilities in their names.

Pet policy: $30 pet rent and $150 pet deposit per pet. Breed restrictions apply.
Green Keys Restricted Breeds: Pit bulls (American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, Staffordshire Terrier, and American Bulldog); German Shepherds; Akitas; Rottweilers; Boxers; Doberman Pinschers; Mastiff Breed; Malamutes.
When full grown, any dog should not be more than 60 pounds.

This property is managed by Green Keys Property Management LLC. We are looking for applicants who can start a lease sooner rather than later. Steps to take:
1. Take the online video tour at the Green Keys PDX website under the Our Listings tab. Click the blue Video Tour button under the address 3715 Boulevard Place.
2. Text Gail at to schedule a showing. 
3. If you like the in-person tour, apply online at Green Keys PDX website by clicking on the For Renters tab.

Applications will not be considered complete until the online application has been filled out completely and the application fee has been received. 
Screening criteria: minimum monthly household income of 2.5 x rent; minimum credit score of 650. 
Application fee: $45 per adult.
Move-in Costs: First month's rent plus a refundable security deposit that is $40 to $60 less than rent

Text2: spacious home in the countryside
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This gorgeous home is situated at the end of a quiet, peaceful cul-de-sac in a wonderful neighborhood where the neighbors all know one another, where birds chirping is the background noise, the sunsets stretch on for miles, and the stars light up the night sky. This home has 2,028 square feet of living area comprising 4 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, a dining room, full kitchen, and 2 separate living rooms both featuring a fireplace. The living room on the ground level features a pool table, and a sliding glass door leading to the back yard. The living room on the 2nd floor features a sliding glass door that leads to the 2nd floor deck, and huge bay windows with a view of the expansive full 1 acre back yard, and then the countryside stretching on beyond that. This home has a full 2 car garage, and comes furnished. The asking rental price is $1,950/month, and tenant is responsible for lawncare and snow removal, as well as for their own utilities, and the local HOA fee of approximately $70/month.

Text2: Seeking: Roommate(s) on East Side of Town (Free Utilities!)
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Hello! We're looking for a roommate at Stella Ridge on the East Side of town. You'll have the entire downstairs area to yourself which includes a full bath, living space, 2 walk in closets, and 2 bedrooms that you can split with another individual. You also will not have to pay for the utilities. 

Because the lower level of the condo is basically its own apartment rent will begin at 1400 per month but there is a special deal that we're offering. If you work for us as a personal assistant for 5 hours a week, we will take your rent down to 1000 a month and if you work for us for 10 hours a week we'll take your rent down to 600 a month. If you choose to split the space with another individual, then you would split the 600 rent each month; so it's possible to get the space for only $300/month if you find someone to stay in the other bedroom. 

Let me know if you're interested! Thanks : ]

Text2: Classic home is charming, comfortable, spacious and well maintained.
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This classic home is charming, comfortable, spacious and well maintained. Located in the Mapleton Fall Creek neighborhood with easy access to downtown, Mass Ave, Broad Ripple and many amenities. Lovely woodwork and hardwood floors on the main level create a beautiful living space. Working gas fireplace in the living room is perfect for cozy fall and winter nights. Kitchen includes quality stainless steel appliances (stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, and storage rack for pantry). Inviting front entry room welcomes you and guests and highlights the home's beautiful woodwork. Unique second floor sunroom provides an ideal space for solitude or for a home office. Two staircase layout allows for convenient circulation throughout the home. Main bathroom has lovely tiled floors, a tub and tiled shower. Front porch provides a great place to enjoy the neighborhood and relax outside. Two story balcony on back side of home also provides a great outdoor space for relaxation or entertaining. Washer/Dryer are located in basement which is accessed from the outside at the back of the home. Basement also provides plenty of storage space. Detached one car garage fits most compact vehicles and is accessible via the alley. Less than one block north there is a local restaurant, convenience store, health clinic, and church. Direct access to IndyGo bus route 19.

Renter covers utilities (gas, electric, water, internet). Recycling and trash pickup are included in rent. Due at signing: first month's rent, deposit, pet deposit (if applicable).

Text2: OPEN HOUSE 12:00-2:00 pm, Sunday, Nov. 13th 2 bedroom lower
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
OPEN HOUSE 12:00-2:00 pm, Sunday, Nov. 13th

December 15th or January 1st - Super spacious, sunny, 2 BR Lower with Vintage Charm. Fridge and gas range, One full bath, One garage parking spot with additional, easy on-street parking. Central Air and new high efficiency furnaces/hot water heaters. Current tenant leaving due to job transfer out of state.

This apartment was renovated in 2021. Improvements made include: Freshly repainted in current colors throughout; Newly refinished hardwood floors throughout (except in kitchen and bath); New blinds in formal rooms; New kitchen floor and stove; New bathroom sink and vanity.

Formal sun room, living & dining rooms featuring built in buffet with art glass and other stained glass windows. Newly remodeled, large bathroom with vintage tile floor. Spacious eat in kitchen. Two bedrooms (10 x10 and 11x12).

Laundry in basement. Private Machines - Not coin operated.

Great Central Location! Walk or take the Bublr Bikes to East North Avenue restaurants, shops and more including North Avenue Market, Paloma - Taco & Tequila, Vennture Brewing, Mekong Cafe, Ca'Lucchenzo, Ted's Cafe, Bel Air Cantina, Crafty Cow, Camp Bar, Il Mito, Rosebud movie theater and more! Near to Vliet Street businesses including Valentine Coffee, The Neighborhood Draft, Times movie Theater, and shopping as well. Close to Washington Park, Wick Field (park with baseball fields and tennis courts), Hart Park - Menomonee River Parkway (bike trails); 15 min drive to Lakefront and UWM, 10 min drive to downtown Milwaukee, and 5 min drive to Marquette University; Short drive/bike ride to Wauwatosa village including Metcalfe's, Outpost, and Metro Market grocery stores, Mayfair Mall, Miller Brewing, American Family Field, Wisconsin Lutheran College, and more. Centrally located to all area major medical centers including Froedert Hospital, the VA, St. Luke's, St. Joseph's, and Medical College of Wisconsin (MCW) - perfect for medical students!

No smokers. Pet friendly (one pet), but on case-by-case basis. A refundable pet deposit is required. NO additional rent for pet. Renter responsible for utilities. 1 month security deposit due at signing. Credit Check done on all applicants. Caring owners who live in the immediate area (just blocks away).

OPEN HOUSE 12:00-2:00 pm, Sunday, Nov. 13th

Text2: Public Transportation, Dog parks, BBQ/Picnic Area
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Welcome to Harbor Pointe Apartments, a great place to call home. Our quiet community is nestled on the shores of scenic Granville Lake just minutes from the Brown Deer and Bayshore shopping districts. Our pet-friendly community is an ideal setting to call home. We offer a full range of Studio, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartment homes to fit your unique needs. Choose our classic Milwaukee apartments or a townhome with a private entry and garage. Regardless of your needs, our dedicated leasing staff is eager to assist you and show you a better style of living! Living at Harbor Pointe is like condo living without any of the hassles. Our 24-hour emergency maintenance is on call waiting to assist you. The community grounds are professionally maintained. Take a walk through our lush, manicured grounds along our paved jogging paths and enjoy the beauty of nature within the metro area. Hop in our heated indoor pool and take a few laps, or simply let our whirlpool's jets massage away the strain of the workout you'll get in our 2 fully equipped fitness rooms! Enjoy entertainment options that include, American Family Field, The Milwaukee Art Museum, and Downtown Milwaukee with all the best attractions of a big city just a short drive away. Local restaurants include Cafe Hollander, Libby Montana Bar & Grill, and Rocky Rococo. Our leasing professionals look forward to scheduling your personalized tour of your new home and showing you how we are making Harbor Pointe the place to live.

Welcome to Harbor Pointe Apartments, a great place to call home. Our quiet community is nestled on the shores of scenic Granville Lake just minutes from the Brown Deer and Bayshore shopping districts. Our pet-friendly community is an ideal setting to call home. We offer a full range of Studio, 1, 2 & 3-bedroom apartment homes to fit your unique needs. Choose our classic Milwaukee apartments or a townhome with a private entry and garage. Regardless of your needs, our dedicated leasing staff is eager to assist you and show you a better style of living! Living at Harbor Pointe is like condo living without any of the hassles. Our 24-hour emergency maintenance is on call waiting to assist you. The community grounds are professionally maintained. Take a walk through our lush, manicured grounds along our paved jogging paths and enjoy the beauty of nature within the metro area. Hop in our heated indoor pool and take a few laps, or simply let our whirlpool's jets massage away the strain of the workout you'll get in our 2 fully equipped fitness rooms! Enjoy entertainment options that include, American Family Field, The Milwaukee Art Museum, and Downtown Milwaukee with all the best attractions of a big city just a short drive away. Local restaurants include Cafe Hollander, Libby Montana Bar & Grill, and Rocky Rococo. Our leasing professionals look forward to scheduling your personalized tour of your new home and showing you how we are making Harbor Pointe the place to live.

Text2: This delightful 2 bedroom and 1 bathroom style apt for rent.

This delightful 2 bedroom, 1 bath home built in 1957 is situated on a generously sized corner lot. The main floor features 864 sq. feet of living space, and the partially finished basement is also comprised of 864 sq. feet. You will find hardwood floors throughout the home, original wood trim in both bedrooms, and lots of natural light. The main level bathroom features a jetted tub and shower combination. The kitchen cabinets in this home are original to the house and are lovingly maintained. The appliances have been updated to a stainless appliances package. The basement features 2 bonus rooms that have been finished out with closets. Outside is a spacious side and back yard that leads to the oversized detached 2-car garage with a wood deck. Located a short drive to all that Lafayette and West Lafayette have to offer, this home is an ideal find for anyone looking for mid-century character with modern conveniences.

Text2: Brand New Apartments!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
LIVE THE SWEET LIFE WITH LUXURY AMENITIES
Welcome home to Reserve of Sugarcreek, a brand-new community in Dayton, OH. We are perfectly situated in Sugarcreek Township, minutes from I-675, offering easy access to Miami Valley Hospital – South Campus, Wright Patterson Air Force Base, and Wright State University. 

Our spacious, pet-friendly, one and two-bedroom apartments and three-bedroom townhomes feature wood-inspired plank floors, stainless steel appliances, shaker-style wood cabinets with soft close drawers, quartz countertops, oversized walk-in closets, washer and dryer, and more! We also offer select homes with no-step living and direct access to your own garage.

Our residents live the Sweet Life surrounded by lush grounds and abundant amenities that feel like a vacation every day. Enjoy our clubhouse with resident lounge, billiards, fitness center, and Zoom Room; heated salt-water pool, sundeck, and outdoor entertainment area with grilling stations, cabana, and firepit lounge. Residents can also access an on-site dog park, pet spa, and playground. The pond and wooded views provide a perfect setting from each residence’s private patio or balcony.

neighborhood coffee and café houses, convenience store.

Hardwood floors, high ceilings and distinct accent painted walls,
curved plaster wall, track and recessed lighting throughout.

disposal. Lots of kitchen cabinets and small bar counter.

minutes to SLU.

Property my former home and the only property I rent. Not a run

character. Unique lay-out needs to be seen.

Text2: Gorgeous eastside 2BR/2BA/lake views!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Elegant apartment homes in GREAT location! 

Spacious 2 Bedroom apartment for $1,210 - $1,280 with beautiful city & lake views!  Price includes heat and water! 

Beautifully appointed kitchens with full appliance package includes: ceramic top stove, large capacity fridge, dishwasher, micro-hood and disposal. Incredibly spacious apartment offers central air,  individually controlled heat, ceiling fans & your choice of plush carpet or elegant engineered wood flooring!  Custom window blinds frame those awesome city and/or lake views!!  Open floor plans with lots of closet space. Pick your custom color accent wall - many options to personalize your place!

Locked lobby/intercom entry, elevator service to each floor, large storage units (free!). Sparkling clean laundry rooms (with brand new smart machines!) and recycle/trash disposal rooms are located on every floor for your convenience! Optional garage or off street/lot Parking. 

The shared community room has full size kitchen, large screen tv and free wifi - perfect place to host your private parties, watch the game, grab a cup of coffee or socialize with friends & neighbors! Rooftop deck in the warmer months has incredible city/lake/festival firework views!! 

Enviable location (by Prospect/North/Downer) is close to everything! UWM, St.Mary's Hospital, Whole Foods, Lake Michigan Beaches, and endless shopping/restaurant/entertainment choices!! Close to walking paths and bus lines too!

Property Description
Van Buren Village Apartments and Townhomes are located on 41 manicured acres in south-east Kettering, OH.  Van Buren is within the excellent Kettering School District.  Our residents also have quick access to I-75, I-675 and route 35.  University of Dayton, Wright State University, and Sinclair are only fifteen minutes away! Van Buren Village Apartments and Townhomes offer spacious one and two bedroom floorplans and a two bedroom townhome floorplan.  All of our apartments have central air and heat, walk-in closets, and full-size washer and dryer hookups.  The community is conveniently located near multiple shopping centers such as The Greene Town Center, the Mall at Fairfield Commons, and the Dayton Mall.  In addition, there are multiple restaurants within minutes of the complex such as Elsa’s, Cold Beer & Cheeseburgers, Frickers and much more!

To schedule a tour
We now book our tour appointments online! Please call or text us at
  show contact info
 to self-schedule from your phone! Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Property Description
Van Buren Village Apartments and Townhomes are located on 41 manicured acres in south-east Kettering, OH.  Van Buren is within the excellent Kettering School District.  Our residents also have quick access to I-75, I-675 and route 35.  University of Dayton, Wright State University, and Sinclair are only fifteen minutes away! Van Buren Village Apartments and Townhomes offer spacious one and two bedroom floorplans and a two bedroom townhome floorplan.  All of our apartments have central air and heat, walk-in closets, and full-size washer and dryer hookups.  The community is conveniently located near multiple shopping centers such as The Greene Town Center, the Mall at Fairfield Commons, and the Dayton Mall.  In addition, there are multiple restaurants within minutes of the complex such as Elsa’s, Cold Beer & Cheeseburgers, Frickers and much more!
Details
Availability date: January 6, 2023
Pets: Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)
Pet notes: Looking for pet friendly apartments in Kettering, OH? Look no further than Van Buren Village Apartments! As one of the few pet friendly communities, we proudly allow cats and dogs here at Van Buren Apartments. Now your pet has the opportunity to relax by your side and enjoy the comforts of your apartment home.

Our Pet Policy
Van Buren Village allows dogs, Only in townhomes. 
Van Buren Village allows cats.
Van Buren Village welcomes pets upon approval
There is a limit of 2 pets per apartment
Van Buren Village does not accept any aggressive breeds including, but not limited to, Dobermans, Pit Bulls, Chows, Akitas, German Shepards, Rottweilers or any non-domestic dogs or any mix of the above stated breeds. Please see leasing office for additional breeds not allowed.
Pet Fees:
$299 (1 pet) Non-Refundable Deposit at move in
$499 (2 pets) Non-Refundable Deposit at move in
$30 per month (1 pet)
$60 per month (2 pets)

For further details on our pet policy, please contact our office staff.

 , Pewaukee, WI 53072Oakton Beach and Tennis Club in Waukesha County’s Lake Country is an exclusive resort-like community of luxury apartment homes. With a superb location nestled on the south shore of Pewaukee Lake and just across Oakton Drive from Western Lakes Golf Club, your private escape is surrounded by exceptional convenience and recreational amenities.,From your doorstep, you can enjoy private lake access with a pier, offering fishing, boating, swimming or sunbathing. Your active lifestyle will include tennis, bicycling, cross-country skiing, jogging or just a quiet stroll along the lake and tree-lined drives. Walk your golf clubs across to Western Lakes Country Club or simply enjoy watching each season transform the 34-acre resort grounds into an ever-changing wonderland of nature’s handiwork.,A variety of floor plans offer elegant amenities such as marble vanities, master bedroom suites with private baths, one or two-car garages, private entries, gourmet kitchens, patios and decks. Text2: 315 Crescent Court. Main floor of a Victorian House
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Welcome to 315 Crescent Court, renovated main floor of a fantastic three-story Victorian located in the heart of historic Crescent Hill. A lovely covered front porch with a swing greets you as you walk up. Heading inside brings you into the parlor which is off a den/office with high ceilings and tons of natural light that are throughout the home. This area is highlighted by the decorative fireplace and columns that separates the area which includes hardwood flooring in both rooms and also offers a large built-in bookcase along the back wall. The hallway off the area leads past the door to the primary suite and down to the kitchen. The kitchen offers all white cabinetry and stainless-steel appliances. Moving forward through the kitchen, you will see a chalkboard wall, and see-through opening to the dining room behind. The dining room then opens into the fabulous family room. You will love how bright and airy this space is thanks to the soaring, hip vaulted ceiling and numerous windows. The sliding glass doors lead out to a cozy balcony. Off the side of the family room is a full bath with pedestal sink, new toilet, new flooring, and skylights. The primary suite offers an enormous bedroom with wall of built-in storage space, additional walk-in closet, and private bath with pedestal sink, wainscoting, and walk-in shower with skylight. Off the back of the primary bedroom is a separate laundry room that can also be accessed from the 2nd bedroom. The 2nd bedroom is also quite roomy, has a hip vaulted ceiling, and walk-in closet. Out back is huge yard with amazing updates to the rear entrance that you will have to view in person. This unit also comes with a large parking area with plenty of space for multiple vehicles. This awesome location is within easy walking distance of all the shops and restaurants along Frankfort Avenue with parking in the back and you're also only a couple minutes away from the Highlands, St. Matthews, and Cherokee Park too. 

$250 Security Deposit.

Washer & Dryer hookups are located in the unit. Tenants will have to provide their own washer & dryer. 

Only 1 small dog is allowed with breed restrictions. No cats. Pet deposit is waived; $50 pet rent per month. 

No Smoking. Credit rating and history is a factor in renting for prospective tenants; but will gladly work with any applicant

BEWARE: Fake Craigslist ads for houses which will request personal information online for the purpose of committing credit fraud. May Team Realtors will NEVER ask for personal credit information through a Craigslist ad.

For more information and to apply visit our website at www.mayteamrealtors.com/rentals.

The private back yard gives you plenty of space to enjoy family gatherings. The large bright kitchen with ample storage is sure to please. The nice sized bedrooms have hardwood floors and the master is attached to the walk-thru half bath. Downstairs you will find a retro style finished basement, great for entertaining! Pool table and custom booths included. This home is convenient to shopping, restaurants, freeway and schools, yet tucked away in a quiet neighborhood. Welcome home! If you are interested please Text me your contact number. I will contact soon.

Beautiful 3 bedroom / 2 full bath home nestled within Shawnee school district. Snowberry Lane is right off of Shawnee road and just down the street from Elmwood school and very close to the middle and high schools.  Very close access to I75.

The home is in an awesome neighborhood and very safe for kids to play and ride their bikes.  Additionally, there is a fenced in backyard with no immediate neighbors behind. The house is full of new amenities including new appliances, new flooring throughout, freshly painted, updated bathrooms, and much more.  Two bedrooms share a common hall bathroom and the main bedroom has it's own bathroom. There is also a very nice sized two car garage, with additional storage. Well maintained landscaping.  Kitchen appliances are included and there is a washer/dryer hookup.

This property will become available for rent on November 19, 2022 at $1,675 per month. A one-year lease is required with a $1,675 security deposit. No smoking and prefer no pets. However, one pet may be approved via a pet application process. No MET.  

The tenant will be responsible for electric, trash removal, and lawn care. The property owner will be responsible for water and sewer.

Welcome home to Elevate at NuLu Apartment Homes. "NuLu" is one of Louisville's historic communities, revitalized to embrace the "New Louisville" way of thinking. This beautifully landscaped community offers a large variety of studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartment homes in both traditional and historic floor plans, spanning back to the 1920s. Happening right now are interior renovations that include new hardwood-style flooring, fully-equipped kitchens with all new stainless steel appliances, granite counter-tops in the kitchen and bathrooms and update cabinets hardware and lighting. There are also amazing, newly opened community amenities! Louisville's largest leash-free pet park, all new fitness center with top of the line equipment, resident lounge and business center offering complimentary Starbucks coffee bar and outdoor kitchen. Elevate at NuLu is a forward-thinking community in a progressive atmosphere, allowing for the perfect recipe Elevate Your Lifestyle.

Text2: Furnished Studio Apartment BRAND NEW Knickerbocker Hotel (702)
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
AVAILABLE. Minimum 3-month rental.
Newly-renovated Studio Apartment (approx 460 sq feet) available for rent. Rent includes heat, electric, WIFI, 200+ station Direct TV/Cable.  

Brand new full-sized kitchen with new white cabinetry, slate countertop, new stainless steel appliances including stove, refrigerator and microwave.  Floors are brand new wood-grain tile. Bathroom completely redone too.  Fully furnished including brand new King size bed, living room has 60-inch Smart TV and more.  Towels, linens, dishes, silverware, pots/pans and everything provided.  Laundry room located in basement with multiple washers/dryers that is token operated - token's are purchased from front desk at $2 each.

The Knickerbocker is a historic building that oozes charm. It has an updated fitness center, 24 hour helpful staff at the front desk, a full-service beauty salon and spa called The Knick Salon on first-floor, and a top restaurant The Knick open 7-days a week with outdoor patio dining.  Walking distance to shops, restaurants, grocery stores, museums, and more; all the best downtown Milwaukee has to offer.

Separate bike locked-storage room (free). Require Security Deposit $800 and 1st month's rent needs to be paid prior to move in.  Discounts offered to multi-month renters.

Parking spot may be available in hotel parking lot for $180 per month OR you can park your car on street for the minimal cost of City of Milwaukee night parking permit which costs $20/4 months or approx. $60/annual.  There is always street parking nearby.  There is also City Green Parking Garage (indoor/heated) 1100 North Cass Street cost is $150 per month.

Won't last long.  Call us to stop by and see unit!

Multiple condos available for rent in The Knickerbocker - all newly renovated.  1 bedroom, 2-bedroom and Studios with full-size kitchen.  All units are totally renovated and beautiful

Text2: Studio furnished condo in Historic Knickerbocker (530) near downtown
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
AVAILABLE NOVEMBER 20.  3 month minimum rentals - Newly-renovated studio apartment (approx 460 sq feet) available for rent.  Bright and sunny with views of Lake Michigan from your unit window. Rent includes heat, electric, WIFI, 200+ station satellite TV, bike lockage storage, 24/7 fitness room, 24/7 hotel front desk. 

Unit has a full-sized kitchen with brown wood cabinetry, new white appliances including, stove, refrigerator, and microwave. Floors are brand new hard wood and tile/vinyl in Kitchen and tile bathroom.  Bathroom completely updated. Huge walk-in closet with built-in shelves. Fully furnished including brand new Queen size bed, living room couch that opens up into twin-size bed, kitchen table, 50-inch smart TV and more. Towels, linens, dishes, silverware, pots/pans and everything provided. Laundry room located in building with multiple washers/dryers. A separate desktop/Nook area with desk

All furniture, bedding, linens are brand new in newly renovated unit.

The Knickerbocker is a historic building that oozes charm. It has an updated fitness center, 24 hour helpful staff at the front desk, a full-service beauty salon and spa called The Knick Salon on first-floor, and a top restaurant The Knick open 7-days a week with outdoor patio dining. The building is walking distance to shops, restaurants, grocery stores, museums, and more; all the best downtown Milwaukee has to offer.

Separate bike locked-storage room (free). Require Security Deposit $500. 

I own/rent multiple condos at the Knickerbocker on the Lake including 2-bedroom, 1-bedroom unit and other Studio units with full-size kitchens - all newly renovated. 

Parking spot in hotel parking lot available in parking lot from Nov 1 to Mar 1 for $180 per month OR you can park your car on street with City of Milwaukee parking permit which costs $20 per 4-months/$55 for year. There is always street parking nearby.  There is also indoor/heated parking lot Cass Street Parking available 3 blocks away at $150 per month.

Text2: Beautiful 2 BED/2 BATH condo available in River West!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
2 BED/2 BATH luxury condo just minutes from the Loop. Enjoy unobstructed city views from dining room, living room and private balcony. Kitchen boasts BRAND NEW WHITE QUARTZ counter tops, upgraded Italian wood grain cabinets, peninsula island that looks out onto combo living/dining area, floor to ceiling plate glass windows, gas fireplace, vertical window blinds, upgraded SS appliances w/convection oven. HUGE floor to ceiling custom built Elfa designed closets in each bedroom, enclosed laundry/storage area, marble master bath w/rainfall steam shower and Jacuzzi tub. Maple hardwood floors throughout, carpet in bedrooms, video camera security and so much more! One heated garage parking space INCLUDED in rent! 

River West is a perfect location for public transportation (1 block to Blue Line train; 1/2 block from Chicago Ave, Milwaukee and Halsted bus lines), easy access to downtown and all neighborhoods (Bucktown, Wicker Park, Mag Mile), shopping, and highways. River West is located right on the edge of the hot Fulton River District in what has now become one of the most popular neighborhoods in downtown Chicago real estate. The growing community has been attracting urbanites that are drawn to its immediacy to downtown, and has since become a trendsetting neighborhood, home to the hottest restaurants and clubs, and with an up-and-coming gallery scene. Walking along "Restaurant Row" on Randolph St, one will find scores of trendy, top-notch restaurants, like Girl and the Goat, Beatrix and Avec. With the Loop about half a mile west, residents can also easily walk to other hot spots, theatre, museums, shopping, and parks.

Text2: looking for someone to take over my lease ending June,2023
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
I'm looking for someone to take over my beautiful one bedroom apartment (720 sqft) in Bloomington, IN 47401.
I have been traveling a lot and I barely lived in this one bedroom (maybe lived here for a total of 20 days?) and I have to move to another state permanently. 

never smoked, no pets.
just one person occupant


I've lived in Bloomington for 3+ years and by far this apartment complex is the SAFEST to live in. I think safety is very important living in Bloomington. You hear people breaking in or strangers looking through your windows at night all the time. I never had any safety issues here at my apartment complex.

Neighbors are really nice, quiet and clean. 

We have great social events among the residents. Apartment does resident appreciation week sometimes and they host movies, BBQs, wine nights, pizza and bagels, or painting pots in the spring all sponsored by the leasing office. 


good perks of this one bedroom:
In unit washer/dryer (You don't have to share laundry room with others!), dishwasher, good management office and maintenance (emergency maintenance also available). In the kitchen, there is an island kitchen table where you can use it for dining or for more space for cooking!
What I love about this one bedroom is the walk in closet. Tons of space for clothes, just extra space. 

Sometimes it causes a lot of headaches if maintenance does not come quickly but our maintenance always comes the same day or the next day at the latest.

1. great amenities - pool, barbecue, gym, coffee bar (ALL FREE)
2. safety - very quiet and safe place. great neighbors too
3. valet trash - they pick up your trash at your door everyday except Friday and Saturday
4. water is included in the rent. you only pay for your gas/electricity.

had carpet in the walk in closet renewed when I moved in.
My lease ends on June 2, 2023. You can renew after if you would like.

Text2: 3 Bedroom 1.5 Bath Rental Home w Attached 1 Car Garage!!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Enjoy this awesome designed 1.5 story cottage in the heart of Jeffersontown! Walking distance to Wal-Mart grocery, restaurants, and entertainment and minutes from I-64, Blankenbaker, and Hurstbourne. This home boasts 3 bedrooms, 1 full and 1 half bath. Walk into a 2-story foyer area with a giant living space with gas log fireplace. There's a separate dining room that's open still to the living room and kitchen spaces. The huge kitchen is a chef's delight and offers a great layout, lots of natural light, range, refrigerator, dishwasher, and built-in microwave. The laundry/mud room is right off the kitchen and makes chores a breeze.

There are 3 bedrooms upstairs. The oversized primary bedroom offers double windows and plenty of space. The full bathroom features a custom vanity with Corian countertop, as well as marble tile walls and flooring. There is also a bonus loft area, perfect for a small office or gaming space. A 1-car garage is attached off the kitchen and there's a nice backyard for events and outdoor fun.

Monthly Rent: $1,745 per month + utilities
Security Deposit: $1,400
Application Fee: $50 per adult resident
Administration Fee: $150

Text2: Lofts is spacious, modern and supports a versatile lifestyle
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This 2 bedroom & 2 bathroom condo at the iconic Mercantile Gallery Lofts is spacious, modern and supports a versatile lifestyle. With stunning city views and a central downtown location, this condo is ideal for those looking for an energetic lifestyle. With the Central Business District and NULU being in such close proximity, the residents of this stunning apartment truly will be spoiled with choice when it comes to accessibility to the city's bars, restaurants and entertainment hubs. The Mercantile building hosts a number of must-have amenities including a private gym, conference room, entertainment space, library, mail, pool table, courtyard and more! The apartment also comes with 1 private garage space! The modern, sleek design is complimented by the character of grand exposed brick walls and high beams throughout. With an open plan that spans 50ft from wall the wall, this apartment is primed for luxurious living, entertaining and an all-encompassing lifestyle. The kitchen is partially completed and includes the peninsula with lower cabinets, sink, and dishwasher. The next owner will have the opportunity to completely remodel the kitchen, or provide only the refrigerator, stove, and cabinetry desired. Outlets and waterlines for the stove and refrigerator are already in place. The master bedroom is spacious with plenty of natural light with adjacent, modern en suites

SCOTT OWENHSG REALTY1305 WASHINGTON AVENUEST LOUIS MODIRECT #  show contact info
 ** OFFICE # show contact info
TEXT OR CALL FOR AN APPOINTMENT  ---   show contact info


THIS HISTORIC HIGHRISE IS LOCATED IN THE HEART OF THE GARMENT DISTRICT DIRECTLY ON WASHINGTON AVENUE.YOU WILL SEE OLD WORLD CHARM AND UNIQUE FEATURES BEGINNING WITH A CHARMING RESTORED LOBBY AND THE ORIGINAL EXQUISITE MIRRORED & PANELED ELEVATOR. 
 OCCUPANCY INSPECTION IS COMPLETE - READY FOR IMMEDIATE MOVE IN - WALK TO EVERYTHING YOU LOVE DOWNTOWN, 6 BLOCKS TO THE METROLINK. PETS ARE WELCOME WITH A $250 NON-REFUNDABLE DEPOSIT. PARKING IN THE ADJACENT LOT IS $50 PER MONTH...**LITTLE BIT OF BUILDING HISTORY**
The building was already used as artists' lofts in the 1980s; in 1999 it was wholey residential. A 2003 renovation converted it to 33 condominiums. The 2007 expansion of Asynchrony Solutions onto the ground floor resulted in the restoration of long-filled-in windows at the street. Barely visible on the building's west face are the faded remains of numerous advertising signs. Among the more legible ones are ads for Wrigley's Spearmint gum and for the building's one-time tenant, King Bee Hats.

Text2: Westminster Place Apartments
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Our community is conveniently located in the premier Central West End neighborhood of St. Louis. Our property appeals to the residents desiring an ideal location in a well-established transit-oriented neighborhood.

Westminster Place offers Apartments ranging from 1 to 2 bedroom with 1-to-2-bathroom, Platinum Apartment Units ranging from 1 to 2 bedroom with 1 to 2 bathrooms, Townhomes ranging from 1 to 3 bedrooms with 1 to 2.5 bathrooms, and Clubhouses ranging from 2 bedroom with 1.5 bathrooms. Pricing may vary, please call to confirm pricing.

We do have a standard of criteria we require to be eligible for leasing. Your monthly income should be three times the rent. We will also run a full background and credit check on each person over the age of 18.

All apartments come equipped with central air conditioning and heating, washer and dryers and washer and dryer hook-up, dishwashers and all electric range/stove.

I would love to schedule an appointment with you to tour our little oasis in the CWE! I’m looking forward to speaking with you soon and helping you find your new home!

 and ask for Shania!

Text2: Senior Living, Pet Friendly 2 bedroom Apartments, Great closets. ( Bat
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Westbrook Place Apartments

We offer some great amenities, and our location can't be beat! We're located across the street from Irving Park, where you can walk the trails, visit the duck pond, or play disc golf! With walking distance of Bronson Battle Creek Hospital, Kellogg Community College, and Battle Creek Central High School. We are also near numerous drug stores, restaurants, and a grocery store.

Westbrook place is an affordable Senior housing community, for individuals 55 years of age and older with utilities included. Residents are responsible for their cable, internet and phone. We are 6 floors tall with 2 elevators, but you can take the stairs if you'd like! We are a pet friendly community with a few exceptions.

A list of community amenities include :

-Door-Side Trash Pick-up - Monday, Wednesday, and Friday
-Community Laundry Facilities - 3 new washers and dryers available for resident use 24 hours
-Hot or cold lunch service delivered to your door for Residents who sign up for it
-Secured entrance - We have a secure entrance so residents can choose who to let into the building

The apartments themselves feature tall ceilings, central Air Conditioning and Heating, and all appliances are included, even microwaves.

If you, or a loved one are looking for a new home, please give us a call!
Let us get you into your new home.


Westbrook Place Communities
183 West St
Battle Creek MI 49037

Text3:

1203 Miremont Dr. Ballwin, MO 63011  show contact info


Enjoy all of the benefits of the excellent location that this 4 Bedroom, 1 ½ bath, 1400 sq ft home has to offer. Charming bungalow with style. About 200 sq feet in finished basement for storage. Wonderful, very safe neighborhood with highly rated schools, close to everything including Costco, Home Depot, and shopping. Rent is $2150/mo, with one month’s deposit. A medium sized dog is permitted, with a $250 pet deposit, and $25/mo pet fee. We take care of sewer. Utilities and lawn maintenance are tenant’s responsibility. We are looking for a 1 year lease or better.

This home has just been completely re-done. Professionally repainted throughout, new roof, new tiling in kitchen and upstairs bath, including bathtub surround. Hardwood and tile flooring throughout, with carpet in bedrooms. Brand new washer and dryer also included. Refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave and oven are also included.

Lower level has enormous master suite (4th bedroom), including two large closets that span the length of the room. Or use it as a large recreation area, complete with cable set up, windows, bathroom and walkout access to a large, green and quiet backyard. Off-street asphalt driveway and asphalt pad will accommodate parking for up to 4 cars.

This home is not for sale, no broker, property management, or real estate company assistance is needed. We must speak with the actual tenant who will be residing in the property. Meeting in person is a must during daylight hours. Please contact Susan or Rick at via CALL to set up an appointment to see this beautiful property. Contact me via e-mail for a rental application. An open house with rental applications will be held soon. This property won’t last, priority will be given to early applicants.

Credit check of 650+, criminal background check in Missouri/Illinois, and employment verification will all be performed. A non-refundable fee of $45 will be assessed for background checks.

Property Description
Enjoy the best in apartment living at Stonebridge Apartment Homes! We are a professionally managed apartment community in southwest Dayton, OH. Stonebridge has 1, 2, 3, and 4 bedroom Beavercreek Dayton apartments that can fit your specific lifestyle. We are located on 32 scenic acres behind The Greene Town Center.You don’t have to worry about the costly expense of home appliances at Stonebridge because every unit features a refrigerator, stove and oven, plus a dishwasher and garbage disposal. The spacious floor plans at our Beavercreek Dayton apartments also have walk-in closets.Stonebridge is surrounded by mature trees and beautiful landscaping, and our residents have access to a variety of amenities. Relax at the Stonebridge clubhouse, volleyball court, or swimming pool.Stonebridge Apartment Homes is 2 minutes from I-675 and 15 minutes from downtown Dayton. The Greene outdoor shopping center is within walking distance, and it has a wide variety of quality shopping, entertainment and dining. Enjoy an evening of entertainment at the Funny Bone Comedy Club or Rave Cinemas. Dining at the Greene includes a variety of ethnic food, fine dining, and chain restaurants such as Chipotle.Stonebridge is owned and managed through Monarch Investment and Management Group. Enjoy the best in apartment living at Stonebridge Apartment Homes! We are a professionally managed apartment community in southwest Dayton, OH. Stonebridge has 1, 2, 3, and 4 bedroom Beavercreek Dayton apartments that can fit your specific lifestyle. We are located on 32 scenic acres behind The Greene Town Center.You don’t have to worry about the costly expense of home appliances at Stonebridge because every unit features a refrigerator, stove and oven, plus a dishwasher and garbage disposal. The spacious floor plans at our Beavercreek Dayton apartments also have walk-in closets.Stonebridge is surrounded by mature trees and beautiful landscaping, and our residents have access to a variety of amenities. Relax at the Stonebridge clubhouse, volleyball court, or swimming pool.Stonebridge Apartment Homes is 2 minutes from I-675 and 15 minutes from downtown Dayton. The Greene outdoor shopping center is within walking distance, and it has a wide variety of quality shopping, entertainment and dining. Enjoy an evening of entertainment at the Funny Bone Comedy Club or Rave Cinemas. Dining at the Greene includes a variety of ethnic food, fine dining, and chain restaurants such as Chipotle.Stonebridge is owned and managed through Monarch Investment and Management Group. We are here to serve you and create a wonderful rental experience. Welcome home!

Text2: $2,350 3bd/2.5bth Duplex, Attatched Garage, Unfinished Basement
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This enormous 2 story 3 bedroom/2.5 bathroom duplex is available November 1st to rent at Sauk Creek Apartments! It's tucked away in the serene neighborhood of Sauk Creek and is less than a minute away from the beltline highway. This location is perfect if you want to live in a park-like setting but also be close to an impressive variety of shops, restaurants, schools, parks, medical facilities, and entertainment options.

Amenities:
Luxury Kitchen
Laundry Room with Washer/Dryer
Private Patio
Breakfast Bar
Ample Closet Space
Central Air
Fireplace
Private, Attached 2 Car Garage
Basement for Storage (Unfinished)
Private Entrance
24-Hour Priority Maintenance
On-Site Management

If you're looking for a place that has enough space to put your belongings, this duplex has it. It has a large amount of closets and cabinets located throughout the residence as well as a huge unfinished basement for extra storage. The first floor includes access to the attached 2 car garage, private patio, laundry room, half bathroom, luxury kitchen, dining room, living room, and family room. The family room has built in bookshelves and cabinets for even more storage space as well as a fireplace that adds an element of comfort. The luxury kitchen includes custom Amish hand-made soft-close cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and granite countertops with a breakfast bar. This duplex is filled with large windows that allow natural light to pour into every room. The second floor has two spacious bedrooms, a full bathroom, and a large master bedroom with a walk-in closet and a private master bathroom.

For added convenience, removing snow and maintaining the lawn won't be something you'll have to worry about. At Sauk Creek Apartments, we take care of that for you! There are also multiple picnic areas with propane grills located throughout our 10 acres of landscaped property that would be free for you to enjoy!

Call to schedule a showing and don't forget to ask about our current MOVE-IN SPECIAL! We're open Monday through Friday between the hours of 9:00am and 5:00pm.


Sauk Creek Apartments Leasing Office:

12 Sayner Ct #57
Madison, WI 53717

Enjoy the best in apartment living at Stonebridge Apartment Homes! We are a professionally managed apartment community in southwest Dayton, OH. Stonebridge has 1, 2, 3, and 4 bedroom Beavercreek Dayton apartments that can fit your specific lifestyle. We are located on 32 scenic acres behind The Greene Town Center.You don’t have to worry about the costly expense of home appliances at Stonebridge because every unit features a refrigerator, stove and oven, plus a dishwasher and garbage disposal. The spacious floor plans at our Beavercreek Dayton apartments also have walk-in closets.Stonebridge is surrounded by mature trees and beautiful landscaping, and our residents have access to a variety of amenities. Relax at the Stonebridge clubhouse, volleyball court, or swimming pool.Stonebridge Apartment Homes is 2 minutes from I-675 and 15 minutes from downtown Dayton. The Greene outdoor shopping center is within walking distance, and it has a wide variety of quality shopping, entertainment and dining. Enjoy an evening of entertainment at the Funny Bone Comedy Club or Rave Cinemas. We know you're not ready to commit to a year-long lease. That's why we offer flexible lease terms and fully furnished common areas. Plus, our housemates are awesome, and we host a monthly house cleaning service. Contact us to schedule an appointment for a tour of our shared living community. You've probably seen the fancy houses that other people have posted on social media. That's one of the benefits of living in a shared home—you can live in a beautiful, updated house at an affordable price. This kitchen alone is enough to make you want to get your own cooking show, but the rest of the house doesn't disappoint either.  The house is furnished and has smart TVs, kitchenware, and furniture. All utilities are shared among roommates. A security deposit and first month's rent are required at the time of move-in. Only single occupancy is allowed, and pets are not permitted. Text  show contact info
 today to save your spot! Everything is updated: bathrooms and floors, cabinets, fireplace, light fixtures. And it gets better. You'll be next door to tons of food and shopping. Plus, you'll have easy access to the interstate to take you wherever you need to go. Get in touch to move into your new lifestyle and meet your amazing, vetted housemates.
If you've been looking for a place to live where you can cook and entertain, look no further than this shared residence. You'll have easy access to the interstate, a great kitchen and lots of space in the rest of the house. And since everything is updated, you'll be right next door to tons of food and shopping. Plus, you'll have vetted housemates who want to meet you. Cooking is a great way to unwind from a stressful day at work, and you can save money on groceries by cooking your meals at home. Plus, it's fun to try new recipes and experiment with different ingredients. And now you can enjoy the benefits of living in a shared household with your friends who like to cook too!

Text2: Private 1350 SF Cabin-Like, 2 BR Apartment w/ Excellent Prairie Grove
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This is a beautiful one-bedroom with den / 2nd bedroom, second-floor, 1350 square foot apartment on the second level of a water’s-edge 30’ X 40’ barn - an open space, unique, rustic, tranquil, private, country loft tucked-in off a country road on a small lake. Very private and rustic - Yet you are just 10 minutes from the NW Train Lines and all the conveniences of Crystal Lake and the excellent Prairie Grove school system.

This open-floor-plan loft apartment occupies the entire second level of a renovated horse barn.  Plus, there is a dedicated 150 square foot laundry and storage room on the first level with storage,  a utility sink, washer and dryer. The apartment has historically housed one or two individuals, has cathedral ceilings, plenty of large windows and is tucked-in next to woods and a small lake. The walls and cathedral ceilings are knotty pine; the floors are beautiful oak hardwood.  This like-new apartment has a full kitchen, full bath, natural gas forced-air heat, four large attractive ceiling fans, dishwasher hookups, two sets of large French doors and central AC. 

The barn and apartment are part of a family compound that sits on 3.3 acres with a small lake and is surrounded by 1,000 + acres of forever wild and farm land. This property is very secluded and private in all directions.   All this living space and privacy is just 10 minutes from the Northwestern Train line and downtown Crystal Lake and from Prairie Grove’s excellent schools.  $1500 / month plus gas and electric utilities. No Pets. No Smoking.  Available November 16.  One and one-half month rent security deposit plus first month’s rent.

Text3:

Property Description
Enjoy the best in apartment living at Stonebridge Apartment Homes! We are a professionally managed apartment community in southwest Dayton, OH. Stonebridge has 1, 2, 3, and 4 bedroom Beavercreek Dayton apartments that can fit your specific lifestyle. We are located on 32 scenic acres behind The Greene Town Center.You don’t have to worry about the costly expense of home appliances at Stonebridge because every unit features a refrigerator, stove and oven, plus a dishwasher and garbage disposal. The spacious floor plans at our Beavercreek Dayton apartments also have walk-in closets.Stonebridge is surrounded by mature trees and beautiful landscaping, and our residents have access to a variety of amenities. Relax at the Stonebridge clubhouse, volleyball court, or swimming pool.Stonebridge Apartment Homes is 2 minutes from I-675 and 15 minutes from downtown Dayton. The Greene outdoor shopping center is within walking distance, and it has a wide variety of quality shopping, entertainment and dining. Enjoy an evening of entertainment at the Funny Bone Comedy Club or Rave Cinemas. Dining at the Greene includes a variety of ethnic food, fine dining, and chain restaurants such as Chipotle.Stonebridge is owned and managed through Monarch Investment and Management Group. We are here to serve you and create a wonderful rental experience. Welcome home!
Details
Availability date: Today
Pets: Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)
Pet notes: Stonebridge allows dogs and cats
We have some dog breed restrictions
$299 for 1 and $499 for 2 non-refundable pet fee
$30 a month for 1 pet and $60 for 2 pets
No more than 2 pets per apartment
A pet addendum, current animal picture and vet records are required
Deposit: Starts at $400
Leasing options: 6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months
Leasing notes: *Short term lease fees apply
Application fee: $50 per adult/$150 admin fee
Amenities
Included in Utilities Cost: AUM BIlling Bundle

Exterior: Balcony/patio
Heating/cooling: Heat: forced air, Central AC
Wiring: Cable-ready
